p: Folk medicine took place in the Kingdom of Arabia Saudia by 1940 with less demand for traditional medicine. Meanwhile, since 1990 the Saudi people changed their thinking towards traditional medicine and have increased its use in common life ( Organization, 2001). Numerous ethnobotanical surveys carried out in Saudi Arabia showed that a large proportion of Saudi citizens are dependent on traditional medicine whether alone or associated with modern medicine ( Bodeker and Ong, 2005).
